name: extract_entities
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool textapi.
Tool description: A text extraction, manipulation, and analysis api. Putting the power of natural language processing (nlp) in every developers hands.
API description: Extracts named entities from the provided text using the specified model and RapidAPI key.

text.description: The text from which to extract named entities.
text.default: U.S. stocks rallied Thursday, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average up 2.9% in a tempestuous first half of the year.

model.description: The model to use for named entity recognition. Defaults to None.
